name: Solid Flywheel Conversion - Mercedes Vito/Sprinter CDi (Incl. CSC)
description:
This is a complete kit to convert your Mercedes Vito or Sprinter  from a dual mass flywheel to a solid flywheel.

Includes:-

1 x Solid Flywheel 
1 x 2pc Clutch Kit
1 x Concentric Slave Cylinder 
1 x Bolt Pack

Not only does this kit do away with the DMF it is also cheaper.

This kit is suitable for the following engine codes :-

OM611 range

These engines are found in the following vehicles -

638 Chassis V-Class and Vito 
Sprinter 901, 902, 903, 904 & 906 Chassis

108CDI 110CDI 112CDI
308CDI 311CDI 313CDI
408CDI 411CDI 413CDI
616CDI 

As always, if you are unsure, please use the contact page on the bottom right and we will advise accordingly.

Valeo equivalent - 835013

name: Solid Flywheel Conversion - VAG 1.9 TDi 105bhp
description:
This is a complete kit to convert your VAG vehicle from a dual mass flywheel to a solid flywheel. 

Includes:- 

1 x Solid Flywheel
1 x 3pc Clutch Kit 
1 x Bolt Pack 

Not only does this kit do away with the DMF it is also cheaper. 

This kit is suitable for the following engine codes :- 

BKC, BXE, BLS, BJB, BRU, BXF, BXJ, CBDC, CLCA, CBDC

CAYB, CAYC (1.6 TDi Engine) 

These engines are found in the majority of 1.9 TDi VW, Audi, Seat and Skoda models built from 2004 onwards, including 

VW - Caddy, Golf V, Golf VI, Jetta, Passat and Touran
Audi - A2 and A3
Seat - Altea, Leon and Toledo 
Skoda - Octavia and Superb

As always, if you are unsure, please use the contact page on the bottom right and we will advise accordingly.

Upgrade to a Valeo Conversion for an extra £50, limited time only!!

* Picture is for reference only!

name: Exedy Racing Organic Clutch Kit - Honda K20 Engine
description:
Brand New Exedy Racing Clutch Kit for the following vehicles :-

2001 - Honda Civic Type R EP3 
2006 - Honda Civic Type R FN2 
2001 - Honda Integra Type R DC5

This clutch kit is recommended for vehicles running up to 30% more power than standard, suitable for fast road and light trackday usage.

name: Exedy OEM Clutch Kit - Honda K20 Engine
description:
Brand New OEM Clutch Kit for the following vehicles :- 

2001 - Honda Civic Type R EP3 
2006 - Honda Civic Type R FN2
2001 - Honda Integra Type R DC5

Straight replacement for your original clutch. 

Exedy Part Number - HCK2052

name: Timing Chain Kit - Honda K20 VTEC Engine
description:
Brand New Timing Chain Kit for the Honda K-Series engines. 

LIMITED TIME OFFER - FREE OIL FILTER WITH ALL TIMING KITS!

Will fit all K20 variants.

Civic Type R EP3
Integra Type R DC5 
Civic Stream 

To be sure, you can send your vehicle details through using the contact button on the bottom right and I'll get back to you ASAP! 

The kit includes -

1 x Timing Chain
1 x Upper Guide 
1 x Left Guide
1 x Right Guide 
1 x Tensioner

Free Postage is also included within Europe! 

SPECIAL OFFER - USE CODE BIGCARTEL5ER FOR £5 OFF!!!
